trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for data protectors.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder basisklassen for data beskyttere.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector"></xref> class by using the provided application name, primary purpose, and specific purposes.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte programnavnet hovedformål og bestemte formål.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren angir den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A>, og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The combination of these three properties must uniquely identify the data you are protecting.
trans-unit.target: Kombinasjonen av disse tre egenskapene må entydig dataene du beskytter.

trans-unit.source: If the data is not uniquely identified, you might inadvertently read the wrong data, or other data might be substituted for yours.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataene ikke identifiseres, kan du ved et uhell lese feil data eller andre data kan erstatte din.

trans-unit.source: Examples of primary and specific purpose pairs are “invoice” and invoice number, “gift card” and gift card number, “password” and URL string.
trans-unit.target: Eksempler på primære og bestemt formål par er "faktura" og faktura tall, "gavekort" og gavekort kortnummer, "passord" og URL-strengen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Den primære hensikten for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for additional important information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer mer viktig informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The specific purposes for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Bestemte formål for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for additional important information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer mer viktig informasjon.

trans-unit.source: applicationName is an empty string or .
trans-unit.target: applicationNameen tom streng eller .

trans-unit.source: -or- primaryPurpose is an empty string or .
trans-unit.target: - eller - primaryPurpose er en tom streng eller .

trans-unit.source: -or- specificPurposes contains an empty string or .
trans-unit.target: - eller - specificPurposes inneholder en tom streng eller .

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a data protector implementation by using the specified class name of the data protector, the application name, the primary purpose, and the specific purposes.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en data beskytter implementering ved hjelp av angitte klassenavnet for data beskytter, programnavnet, primære formålet og bestemte formål.

trans-unit.source: The class name for the data protector.
trans-unit.target: Klassenavnet for data beskyttelsen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Den primære hensikten for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: The specific purposes for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Bestemte formål for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: A data protector implementation object.
trans-unit.target: En beskytter implementering dataobjektet.

trans-unit.source: providerClass is .
trans-unit.target: providerClassis .

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash of the property values specified by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en hash-kode med verdier som er angitt av konstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: GetHashedPurpose computes the hash of the application name and the full purpose.
trans-unit.target: GetHashedPurpose beregner hash-koden for programnavnet og fullstendig formålet.

trans-unit.source: The full purpose is a concatenation of all the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Full formålet er en sammenkobling av alle de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each of the three parts is prefaced with its length so the hash can be reversed.
trans-unit.target: Hver av de tre delene er innledes med lengden slik hash-koden kan reverseres.

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that contain the hash of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName*>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose*>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes*> properties.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder hash-koden for den <> </> *>, <> </> *>, og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes*>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes*>

trans-unit.source: Determines if re-encryption is required for the specified encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om ny kryptering er påkrevd for den angitte krypterte data.

trans-unit.source: The encrypted data to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: De krypterte dataene som skal evalueres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data must be re-encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene må være kryptert på nytt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the hash is prepended to the text array before encryption.
trans-unit.target: Angir om hash-koden er foran teksten matrisen før kryptering.

trans-unit.source: By default, it is assumed that derived classes will prepend the hash of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A> properties to the plain text before encryption, and will check and verify the hash during decryption.
trans-unit.target: Som standard antas det at avledede klasser prepend hash-koden for den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A>, og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A>egenskapene til ren tekst før kryptering, og vil kontroller og hash-koden under dekryptering.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.SpecificPurposes%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.PrimaryPurpose%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ApplicationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a derived class wants to specify the prepended data on its own (for example as an optional entropy value), this property can be overridden and set to return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den utledede klassen ønsker å angi prepended dataene på sin egen (for eksempel som en valgfri entropy verdi) denne egenskapen kan overstyres og satt til å returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: If PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext is `false`, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Protect%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Unprotect%2A> passes directly through to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ProviderProtect%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ProviderUnprotect%2A> overrides without altering the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Hvis PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext `false`, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Protect%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Unprotect%2A>sender direkte via til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ProviderProtect%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ProviderUnprotect%2A>overstyrer uten endring av bytematrise.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ProviderUnprotect%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.ProviderProtect%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Unprotect%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Protect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the primary purpose for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Henter det primære formålet for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Den primære hensikten for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: Protects the specified user data.
trans-unit.target: Beskytter angitte brukerdataene.

trans-unit.source: The data to be protected.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som skal være beskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: userData is .
trans-unit.target: userDatais .

trans-unit.source: Specifies the delegate method in the derived class that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Protect*> method in the base class calls back into.
trans-unit.target: Angir metoden representanten i den utledede klassen som den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Protect*>i basisklassen metodekall tilbake til.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Protect*>

trans-unit.source: The data to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Dataene krypteres.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder de krypterte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the delegate method in the derived class that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Unprotect*> method in the base class calls back into.
trans-unit.target: Angir metoden representanten i den utledede klassen som den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Unprotect*>i basisklassen metodekall tilbake til.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Unprotect*>

trans-unit.source: The data to be unencrypted.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som skal være kryptert.

trans-unit.source: The unencrypted data..
trans-unit.target: Datatypen ukryptert..

trans-unit.source: Gets the specific purposes for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: Henter de bestemte formålene for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: A collection of the specific purposes for the protected data.
trans-unit.target: En samling av bestemte formål for de beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: Unprotects the specified protected data.
trans-unit.target: Unprotects de angitte beskyttede dataene.

trans-unit.source: The encrypted data to be unprotected.
trans-unit.target: De krypterte dataene skal være ubeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the plain-text data.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder dataene ren tekst.

trans-unit.source: encryptedData is .
trans-unit.target: encryptedDatais .

trans-unit.source: encryptedData contained an invalid purpose.
trans-unit.target: encryptedDatainneholdt en ugyldig formålet.
